about_the_game:
An interactive musical adventure for the whole family

Adventures of a Cat in Space is a family-friendly point & click adventure. After being accidentally launched into space, a cat is on a mission to find their way back home. Along the way you will need to solve puzzles and explore distant planets across the galaxy to unlock original music and songs to  power up your navigation system and get back to Earth in this cosy adventure purrrfect for all ages.

Game features

  • Simple point & click interface

  • Hand-drawn animation

  • Original songs and music

  • Drag & drop single-item inventory

  • Achievements

The Doctor's companion

Adventures of a Cat in Space stars Olivier award winner Arthur Darvill (Doctor Who, Broadchurch, Legends of Tomorrow) who not only voices the ship's onboard computer, but also performs the game's main theme song.

A cosy creative collaboration

Adventures of a Cat in Space is a creative collaboration between narrative designers, musicians and game developers, with the sole purpose of creating a beautifully immersive, fun and rewarding experience for children and families.

Little Seeds Music

Little Seeds Music was established in 2015 with the mission to provide children and families with unforgettable, high quality musical experiences for all generations to enjoy and share together. Our work is supported and recognised by Arts Council England and we have created work in association with Half Moon Theatre, Z-arts, The Story Museum, and The Met, Bury.

As well as producing theatrical touring work, we also coordinate engagement projects across the country with a focus on providing opportunities for young people to develop songwriting and composition skills. Our 2020 digital production ‘Rolling Down The Road’ was named by the Guardian as one of the best pieces of theatre to stream that year, and their work has toured extensively across the UK to venues including Sage Gateshead, HOME, Warwick Arts Centre, Nottingham Theatre Royal, and The Marlowe.

Tall Story Games

Creators of the acclaimed adventure game Lucy Dreaming and the upcoming Heir of the Dog, Tall Story Games Ltd was founded in 2020 by husband and wife creative team Tom and Emma Hardwidge as a way to tell stories in an engaging and creative way.

With over 25 years with experience in the creative and storytelling industries, Tom is the creative driving force behind the narrative-driven adventure games we produce. Emma's career in children's television, and marketing brings specialist insights and strategic expertise to the team.

  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Video card with at least 512MB Shared VRAM & openGL 2.0 support
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
